page.title: 19HEALTH AND PUBLIC SERVICES
page.content: IN THE OATHLAW AREA THERE ARE BOTH {MEDICAL}AND{GENERAL PUBLIC SERVICES. IN BRECHIN THERE IS A{HEALTH CENTRE WHICH HOUSES THE{HEALTH CARE TEAM. THIS TEAM COMPRISES OF :A{GENERAL {PRACTIONER.}A{DISTRICT NURSE,}A{HEALTH {VISITOR,}A{MIDWIFE}AND A{PSYCHIATRIC {NURSE.THEY}MAY WORK IN CONJUNCTION WITH A{SOCIAL WORKER,}WHO WILL GIVE PEOPLE, ESPECIALLY ELDERLY AND THE UNEMPLOYED, ADVICE. THERE IS ALSO A{HOME HELP SERVICE, {MEALS ON WHEELS}AND A{VOLUNTARY CAR {SERVICE}ORGANISED BY THE{RED CROSS. OTHER SERVICES INCLUDE A{DENTIST, {CHIROPODIST,}AND EVEN A{LIBRARY VAN. INSTEAD OF SHOPPING IN THE TOWN, THE PEOPLE HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO BUY PROVISIONS FROM THE{VANS}WHICH SELL {MEAT}AND{GROCERIES.}HOWEVER A{BUS {SERVICE}IS AVAILABLE FOR THOSE WHO WISH TO SHOP ELSEWHERE.
